quoteText:
4. Disclaimer of Warranties

You understand and agree that your use of Ballotpedia is entirely at your own risk and that our services are provided "As Is" and "As Available". Ballotpedia does not make any express or implied warranties, endorsements or representations whatsoever as to the operation of the Ballotpedia website, information, content, materials, or products. This shall include, but not be limited to, implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose and non-infringement, and warranties that access to or use of the service will be uninterrupted or error-free or that defects in the service will be corrected.
title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at the users' sole risk
